unnormalised: **Question: Builder Reviews: How reliable are they, really?**
normalised: **Question: Builder Reviews: How reliable are they, really?**

unnormalised: Okay, so I'm looking to buy a flat in a new project near Electronic City, Bangalore, and naturally, I've been scouring the internet for builder reviews. But honestly, I'm feeling a bit lost. One review says "XYZ Builders are amazing!", another says "Avoid XYZ Builders like the plague!". What gives?
normalised: Okay, so I'm looking to buy a flat in a new project near Electronic City, Bangalore, and naturally, I've been scouring the internet for builder reviews. But honestly, I'm feeling a bit lost. One review says "X Y Z Builders are amazing!", another says "Avoid X Y Z Builders like the plague!". What gives?

unnormalised: How reliable are these builder reviews, really? Are they genuine or are they planted by the builders themselves (or even their competitors!)? I saw one thread mentioning paid reviews on websites for as little as Rs. 500. Seems fishy!
normalised: How reliable are these builder reviews, really? Are they genuine or are they planted by the builders themselves (or even their competitors!)? I saw one thread mentioning paid reviews on websites for as little as rupee five hundred. Seems fishy!

unnormalised: I'm trying to decide between a project by "ABC Constructions" and another by "R.K. Enterprises." Has anyone had firsthand experience with either of these builders? Particularly regarding construction quality, adherence to the promised possession date (which they’ve already pushed from Jan 2023 to now sometime in Q3 2024), and overall customer service? I attended their sales pitch on 26/01/2023 and everything sounded so promising then!
normalised: I'm trying to decide between a project by "A B C Constructions" and another by "R.K. Enterprises." Has anyone had firsthand experience with either of these builders? Particularly regarding construction quality, adherence to the promised possession date (which they’ve already pushed from January two thousand and twenty three to now sometime in Q three two thousand and twenty four), and overall customer service? I attended their sales pitch on twenty six January two thousand and twenty three and everything sounded so promising then!

unnormalised: Also, how far back should I consider reviews? A review from 2018 might not be relevant if the company has changed management since then. Should I only focus on reviews from, say, the past 2 years? I’m visiting the RERA office on 10/11/2024 at 11:00 hrs to check on pending cases too, maybe that’ll give me some clarity. Any advice from those who've gone through this process before would be highly appreciated! Thanks in advance! Jai Hind!
normalised: Also, how far back should I consider reviews? A review from two thousand and eighteen might not be relevant if the company has changed management since then. Should I only focus on reviews from, say, the past two years? I’m visiting the R E R A office on tenth November two thousand and twenty four at eleven zero zero hours to check on pending cases too, maybe that’ll give me some clarity. Any advice from those who've gone through this process before would be highly appreciated! Thanks in advance! Jai Hind!
